FuncDef: This command configures the source IP match condition.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IPv6 address (applies only to the 7750 SR).
Specifies the prefix length (applies only to the 7750 SR). Values-1 to 128.
Specifies the IPv4 address and mask. Values-ip-address a.b.c.d.
Specifies the mask, expressed as a dotted quad. Values-a.b.c.d.
